dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3598 IH: Migratory Birds of the Americas Conservation Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Kind (for himself and Mr. Wittman) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act to reauthorize the Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Migratory Birds of the Americas Conservation Act.

section.header: Reauthorization of Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act
section.text: Section 10 of the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act (16 U.S.C. 6109) is amended to read as follows:

subsection.text: There is authorized to be appropriated to carry out this Act $6,500,000 for each of fiscal years 2018 through 2023.
Of the amounts made available under subsection (a) for each fiscal year, not less than 75 percent shall be expended for projects carried out at a location outside of the United States.
